(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Tomorrow))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBN Eat)
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP (PRP$ your) (NNP Family) (NN Day)))))
    (. !)))


nsubjpass(Eat-3, Tomorrow-1)
auxpass(Eat-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, Eat-3)
prep(Eat-3, with-4)
poss(Day-7, your-5)
nn(Day-7, Family-6)
pobj(with-4, Day-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD grew)
      (PRT (RP up))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (DT a) (NN home)))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (PRP$ my) (NN mom))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (NP (DT a) (NN homemaker))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(grew-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, grew-2)
prt(grew-2, up-3)
prep(grew-2, in-4)
det(home-6, a-5)
pobj(in-4, home-6)
advmod(homemaker-12, where-7)
poss(mom-9, my-8)
nsubj(homemaker-12, mom-9)
cop(homemaker-12, was-10)
det(homemaker-12, a-11)
advcl(grew-2, homemaker-12)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (JJ Nowadays) (NN everyone))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJR busier))
      (SBAR (IN so)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NNS families))))
          (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
            (ADVP (RB actually))
            (VP (VB have)
              (NP (DT the) (NN time)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB eat)
                      (PRT (RP together))
                      (SBAR
                        (WHNP (WDT which))
                        (S
                          (VP (VBZ is)
                            (VP (VBG why)
                              (NP (DT every) (NN year)))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


amod(everyone-2, Nowadays-1)
nsubj(busier-4, everyone-2)
cop(busier-4, is-3)
root(ROOT-0, busier-4)
mark(have-13, so-5)
det(lot-7, a-6)
nsubj(have-13, lot-7)
prep(lot-7, of-8)
pobj(of-8, families-9)
aux(have-13, do-10)
neg(have-13, n't-11)
advmod(have-13, actually-12)
advcl(busier-4, have-13)
det(time-15, the-14)
dobj(have-13, time-15)
aux(eat-17, to-16)
infmod(time-15, eat-17)
prt(eat-17, together-18)
nsubj(why-21, which-19)
aux(why-21, is-20)
ccomp(eat-17, why-21)
det(year-23, every-22)
tmod(why-21, year-23)

  (S
    (NP (CD one) (NN day))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBN set)
        (ADVP (RB aside))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB remember)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN importance))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG having)
                      (NP (DT a) (NN meal))))))
              (ADVP (RB together)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (S
      (VP (VBG eating)
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP (DT the) (NN family)))))
    (VP (MD should) (RB n't)
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB just))
        (VB occur)
        (NP
          (ADVP (RB once))
          (DT a) (NN year))))
    (. !)))

det(family-5, the-4)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (MD should)
      (VP (VB be)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (JJ regular) (NN time))
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB where))
            (S
              (NP (DT the) (NN family))
              (VP (VBZ comes)
                (PRT (RP together))
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB share)
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (DT a) (NN meal)
                          (CC and)
                          (NN bond))))))))))))
    (. .)))

aux(time-6, should-2)
cop(time-6, be-3)
det(time-6, a-4)
amod(time-6, regular-5)
root(ROOT-0, time-6)
advmod(comes-10, where-7)
det(family-9, the-8)
nsubj(comes-10, family-9)
rcmod(time-6, comes-10)
prt(comes-10, together-11)
aux(share-13, to-12)
xcomp(comes-10, share-13)
prep(share-13, in-14)
det(meal-16, a-15)
pobj(in-14, meal-16)
cc(meal-16, and-17)
conj(meal-16, bond-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (MD will)
        (VP (VB be)
          (VP (VBG giving)
            (NP (CD two))
            (NP (NNS talks))
            (NP (NN today)
              (CC and)
              (NN tomorrow))
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP (`` ``)
                (NP (NNP Taking) (NNP Family) (NNP Photos))
                ('' '')
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NN conjunction))
                    (PP (IN with)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NNP MINDEF\/SAF) (POS 's))
                        (`` ``)
                        (S
                          (VP (NN Eat)
                            (PP (IN with)
                              (NP (PRP$ your) (NNP Family) (NN Day)))))
                        ('' '')))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBD thought)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (MD would)
              (VP (VB share)
                (NP
                  (NP (CD one))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (PRP$ my) (NN slides))))
                (PP (IN on)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT some) (NNS ideas))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHPP (IN on)
                        (WHNP (WP what)))
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP you))
                        (VP (MD can)
                          (VP (VB do)
                            (PP (IN during)
                              (NP (PRP$ your) (`` ``)
                                (S
                                  (VP (VB Eat)
                                    (PP (IN with)
                                      (NP (PRP$ your) (NNP Family) (NN Day)))))
                                ('' '') (NN meal)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

aux(giving-4, will-2)
aux(giving-4, be-3)

prep(Photos-14, in-16)
pobj(in-16, conjunction-17)
prep(conjunction-17, with-18)
pobj(with-18, MINDEF\/SAF-19)
possessive(MINDEF\/SAF-19, 's-20)
dep(MINDEF\/SAF-19, Eat-22)
prep(Eat-22, with-23)
poss(Day-26, your-24)
nn(Day-26, Family-25)

(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP have) (RB n't)
        (VP (VBD had)
          (S
            (NP (DT a) (JJ nice))
            (VP (VB sit)
              (PRT (RP down))
              (NP (NN meal))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN family))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP (NNP awhile))))))
            (, ,)))))))


mark(had-5, If-1)
nsubj(had-5, you-2)
aux(had-5, have-3)
neg(had-5, n't-4)
root(ROOT-0, had-5)
det(nice-7, a-6)
nsubj(sit-8, nice-7)
ccomp(had-5, sit-8)
prt(sit-8, down-9)
dobj(sit-8, meal-10)
prep(sit-8, with-11)
det(family-13, the-12)
pobj(with-11, family-13)
prep(family-13, for-14)
pobj(for-14, awhile-15)


(ROOT
  (SQ (MD may)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VB encourage)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB take)
            (NP (DT this) (NN opportunity)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB organize)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT a) (NN meal))
                      (PP (IN with)
                        (NP (DT a) (JJ conscious) (NN effort))))
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB build)
                          (NP (NN family) (NNS togetherness)))))))))))))
    (. !)))


aux(encourage-3, may-1)
nsubj(encourage-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, encourage-3)
nsubj(take-6, you-4)
aux(take-6, to-5)
xcomp(encourage-3, take-6)
det(opportunity-8, this-7)
dobj(take-6, opportunity-8)
aux(organize-10, to-9)
infmod(opportunity-8, organize-10)
det(meal-12, a-11)
dobj(organize-10, meal-12)
prep(meal-12, with-13)
det(effort-16, a-14)
amod(effort-16, conscious-15)
pobj(with-13, effort-16)
aux(build-18, to-17)
xcomp(organize-10, build-18)
nn(togetherness-20, family-19)
dobj(build-18, togetherness-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB read)
        (NP (JJR more))
        (PP (IN about) (`` ``)
          (S
            (VP (NN Eat)
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NNP Family) (NN Day)))))
          ('' ''))
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Centre))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (NNP Fathering) (NNP website)
                (CC and)
                (NNP Dadsforlife)))))))
    (. .)))

aux(read-3, can-2)
root(ROOT-0, read-3)
dobj(read-3, more-4)

prep(Eat-7, with-8)

(ROOT
  (NP (NN sg)))


root(ROOT-0, sg-1)
